effect.name: Gauss Blur 2D
effect.author: Defisym
effect.description:
Applies a 2D Gaussian blur effect to an input texture using a 3x3 kernel with adjustable radius. The shader samples neighboring pixels and weights them according to a Gaussian distribution to produce a smooth blur effect. DX11 only.
Notes: DirectX 9 Pixel Shader version 3.0 is broken on Fusion for a long time, more specifically the texture coordinates, so this shader may not work.
